line.originaltext: 1 cup butter
1 cup white sugar
1 egg
1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract
2 1/2 cups sifted all-purpose flour
1/2 teaspoon salt
1 cup rolled oats
1/4 teaspoon peppermint extract
3 drops red food coloring
2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar
5 (1.5 ounce) bars milk chocolate candy
line.annotation: create_ing(ing58, "5 (1.5 ounce) bars milk chocolate candy")

line.originaltext: In a medium bowl, cream together butter or margarine and white sugar until light and fluffy.
In a medium bowl, cream together butter or margarine and white sugar until light and fluffy.
In a medium bowl, cream together butter or margarine and white sugar until light and fluffy.
Blend in egg and vanilla.
Sift together flour and salt.
Add to creamed mixture and mix well.
Stir in oats.
Divide dough in half.
line.annotation: separate(ing64, ing65, "dough first half", ing66, "dough second half", "divide")

line.originaltext: Add peppermint extract and a few drops of food color to half of dough.
Chill for several hours.
Chill for several hours.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Roll out each half of dough to 1/8 inch thickness on surface sprinkled lightly with confectioners' sugar.
Roll out each half of dough to 1/8 inch thickness on surface sprinkled lightly with confectioners' sugar.
Roll out each half of dough to 1/8 inch thickness on surface sprinkled lightly with confectioners' sugar.
line.annotation: do(ing68, t14, ing69, "rolled dough", "roll out to 1/8 inch thickness")

line.originaltext: Cut out half of each color with the 2 1/2 inch heart shaped cookie cutter, and half with a 1 1/2 inch cookie cutter.
line.annotation: create_tool(t15, "2 1/2 and 1 1/2 inch heart shaped cookie cutters")

line.originaltext: Cut out half of each color with the 2 1/2 inch heart shaped cookie cutter, and half with a 1 1/2 inch cookie cutter.
line.annotation: cut(ing69, t15, ing70, "hearts", "half and half for both halves of dough")

line.originaltext: Place them on unprepared cookie sheets.
Place them on unprepared cookie sheets.
Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven.
line.annotation: cook(ing70, t13, ing71, "baked cookies", "10 to 12 minutes")

line.originaltext: Remove from oven and place 1 one square (1/8) of a chocolate bar onto the center of each large heart.
Remove from oven and place 1 one square (1/8) of a chocolate bar onto the center of each large heart.
line.annotation: combine({ing58, ing72}, ing74, "chocolate on big hearts", "1 square per big heart")

line.originaltext: Place small heart on top and press lightly to secure.
line.annotation: combine({ing73, ing74}, ing75, "cookies", "small heart on top, press to secure")

line.originaltext: Transfer to rack to cool.
